activities: International SOS Assistance, Inc. is an International SOS Group of Company.  International SOS Assistance provides medical assistance and travel security services both corporate and individual clients.  For that purpose International SOS may collect information personal and travel information.  This information is collected directly from individuals when they have subscribed to International SOS products and services.
